summary: This code indicates the decision to use brute force approach in a Natural Language Processing (NLP) task, emphasizing that there is no specific strategy and all options are randomized.

details.comment: This code indicates the decision to use brute force approach in a Natural Language Processing (NLP) task, emphasizing that there is no specific strategy and all options are randomized.
details.content:
I DECIDE TO BRUTE FORCE IT. [TIMELINE!]
THERE IS NO MUCH STRATEGY IN NLP. [TIMELINE!]
NO PRESUMPTION. ALL RANDOMIZED. [TIMELINE!]
